attributes.action: accept St Georges day as a national holiday.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
St George is the patron saint of England. Not only was George a martyr of the Christian faith, but there have been awesome legends about George and the dragon.
Whilst we recognise St Georges day, we don't do enough in Georges honour. I believe we should request to have it as a public holiday!

rejection.details: There is a similar petition at http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/EnglandSaint/
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
